Posted By: dragonking987 (7/18/2010 11:15:02 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Poor chandra. The only real reason why monored bothers to use her is because she can deal with baneslayer, but now that we have combust, she lost a lot of her utility.  
  
Her big issue is that once your opponent does 1-2 points of damage to her, she's not threatening anyone with her ultimate (it'll take too long to build her up to 8 at that point), which means it's pointless to use her horrible +1, so then you're stuck with a -X that will kill herself quickly. Compared to other planeswalkers, like elspeth or gideon or jace 2.0 or ajani vengeant, who have very solid +1 or 0 abilities, which means they're a threat even if they're at 1-2 loyalty.
posts.html:

Her big issue is that once your opponent does 1-2 points of damage to her, she's not threatening anyone with her ultimate (it'll take too long to build her up to 8 at that point), which means it's pointless to use her horrible +1, so then you're stuck with a -X that will kill herself quickly. Compared to other planeswalkers, like elspeth or gideon or jace 2.0 or ajani vengeant, who have very solid +1 or 0 abilities, which means they're a threat even if they're at 1-2 loyalty.

Rating:

posts.post_content: I don't know why she's so hated, she lands with 6 counters. That's staying power. Her 1 damage doesn't seem like much, but with her pet [Chandra's Spitfire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra's Spitfire) and a [Quest for Pure Flame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quest for Pure Flame) it's a pretty serious threat. Her abilities may not be interesting, or subtle lol, but that's what I expect from a Pyromancer.
